Posts.Content: MoMo, I am exactly the same. All I can see is my scalp even though my husband says there are "shoots" and any hair is fuzzy, horrible and an awful colour. I guess we just have to be patient! Weirdly my eyebrows and eyelashes have come back ok. In the meantime hats and wigs at the ready....at least it's winter and a bobble hat is vaguely appropriate! Posts.Title: Want hair back
